Posts.Content: Today it is two years since my diagnosis. Focus on your goals, trust everyone and you have got this!Â
Posts.Title: MRI results & surgery / treatment plan tomorrow

Posts.Content: Massive hugs for tomorrow. Remember those feelings so clearly. They know what they are doing and there are so many options. Just take it one day at a time and feel however you feel xx
